5.1 #LayoutsAndViews.NavbarHorizontal Horizontal navbar

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.MY_NAVBAR_HORIZONTAL {
  .navbar("horizontal"; span; a; ~".selected"; false; false);

  .MY_BRAND {
    .sugar-cube('default'; 22px);
    margin: 12px 0 0;
  }
}

.MY_NAVBAR_HORIZONTAL_WITH_DROPDOWNS {
  .navbar("horizontal"; ~"li.menu-item"; a; ~".active"; ~".SHOW_MENU"; ~"span.DD");

  .MY_BRAND {
    .sugar-cube('default'; 22px);
    margin: 12px 0 0;
  }

  .CARET_DOWN {
    .getFaIcon('caret-down');
  }

  .DD {
    .navbar-submenu-menu("floating"; span);

    .DIVIDER {
      .navbar-submenu-menu-divider();
    }
  }
}

.MY_NAVBAR_HORIZONTAL_CLASS_NAMES {
  .navbar("horizontal"; ~".nav--item"; ~".nav--item-link"; ~".loaded"; false; false);

  .MY_BRAND {
    .sugar-cube(~"%23000", 22px);
    margin: 12px 0 0;
  }

  .CARET_DOWN {
    .getFaIcon('caret-down');
  }
}
.MY_USER_AVATAR0 {
  .avatar();
  float: left;
  margin-right: .5em;
Example
Menu 1 Selected Menu 2 Very long text appears on menu item number 3 that should turn into ellipsis

 
  • Submenu 1 Submenu 2 Submenu 3 Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text
  • Menu 1 Submenu 1 Submenu 2 Submenu 3 Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text
  • Selected Menu 2 Submenu 1 Submenu 2 Submenu 3 Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text
  • Very long text appears on menu item number 3 that should turn into ellipsis Submenu 1 Submenu 2 Submenu 3 Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text
  • Submenu 1 Submenu 2 Submenu 3 Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text

 
Menu 1
Selected Menu 2
Markup: documented-components/hbs/navbar-horizontal.hbs 
<div class="MY_NAVBAR_HORIZONTAL">
    <span>
        <a><span class="MY_BRAND"></span></a>
    </span>
    <span>
        <a>Menu 1</a>
    </span>
    <span class="selected">
        <a>Selected Menu 2</a>
    </span>
    <span>
        <a>Very long text appears on menu item number 3 that should turn into ellipsis</a>
    </span>
    <span></span><!-- intentionally empty element is a self-growing spacer in navbar -->
    <span>
        <a><span class="MY_USER_AVATAR"></span></a>
    </span>
</div>
<br>&nbsp;

<ul class="MY_NAVBAR_HORIZONTAL_WITH_DROPDOWNS">
    <li class="menu-item menu-item-1">
        <a><span class="MY_BRAND"></span></a><a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-1`, `SHOW_MENU`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        <span class="DD">
            <span><a>Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text</a></span>
        </span>
    </li>
    <li class="menu-item menu-item-2">
        <a>Menu 1</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-2`, `SHOW_MENU`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        <span class="DD">
            <span><a>Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text</a></span>
        </span>
    </li>
    <li class="menu-item menu-item-3 active">
        <a>Selected Menu 2</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-3`, `SHOW_MENU`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        <span class="DD">
            <span><a>Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text</a></span>
        </span>
    </li>
    <li class="menu-item menu-item-4">
        <a>Very long text appears on menu item number 3 that should turn into ellipsis</a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-4`, `SHOW_MENU`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        <span class="DD">
            <span><a>Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text</a></span>
        </span>
    </li>
    <li class="menu-item menu-item-5"></li><!-- intentionally empty element is a self-growing spacer in navbar -->
    <li class="menu-item menu-item-6">
        <a><span class="MY_USER_AVATAR"></span></a> <a onclick="toggleClass(`menu-item-6`, `SHOW_MENU`)"><i class="CARET_DOWN"></i></a>
        <span class="DD">
            <span><a>Submenu 1</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 2</a></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 3</a></span>
            <span class="DIVIDER"></span>
            <span><a>Submenu 4 with very very very very very long text</a></span>
        </span>
    </li>
</ul>
<br>&nbsp;

<nav class="MY_NAVBAR_HORIZONTAL_CLASS_NAMES">
    <article class="nav--item">
        <span class="nav--item-link" href="#"><span class="MY_BRAND"></span></span>
    </article>
    <article class="nav--item">
        <span class="nav--item-link" href="#">Menu 1</span>
    </article>
    <article class="nav--item loaded">
        <span class="nav--item-link" href="#">Selected Menu 2</span>
    </article>
    <article class="nav--item"></article><!-- intentionally empty element is a self-growing spacer in navbar -->
    <article class="nav--item"></article><!-- intentionally empty element, blank when avatar is not present -->
</nav>
Source: documented-components/navbar.less, line 1
